hero.headline: Speak English with
hero.description: 1-to-1 English coaching designed for adults who understand the language but struggle to speak it. Build real communication skills in a safe, judgment-free environment.

introVideo.title: A Message from
introVideo.watchVideo: Watch: A Message from Your Teacher
introVideo.whoIAmText: I'm Said, a Moroccan English teacher with years of experience helping adults gain confidence in speaking. I focus on practical, real-life English, not textbook perfection. My goal is to help you speak clearly, naturally, and confidently in any situation.
introVideo.whoThisIsForText: Adults who understand English but struggle to speak it. Professionals, job seekers, or anyone who feels stuck and wants to finally communicate fluently.
introVideo.whatMakesDifferentText: Lessons are personalized for your goals, not a generic curriculum. You speak more than you listen, practice real conversations, and get feedback that actually helps you improve.
introVideo.noPressureText: A safe, supportive environment where mistakes are part of learning. Learn at your pace, and grow at your rhythm.

whyTakalam.title: Why
whyTakalam.subtitle: This isn't just another English course. It's a different approach to learning.
whyTakalam.audienceSubtitle: If any of these goals resonate with you, we should talk.
whyTakalam.audience1Desc: Lead meetings, present ideas, and communicate with international clients without second-guessing yourself.
whyTakalam.audience2Desc: You understand everything but freeze when speaking? We'll unlock your voice through guided conversation practice.
whyTakalam.audience3Desc: Practice answering tough questions, introduce yourself naturally, and make a great impression in English.
whyTakalam.audience4Desc: Targeted preparation for IELTS, TOEFL, Duolingo English Test (DET), and other international exams.
whyTakalam.audience5Desc: Emails, presentations, negotiations, and client calls. Communicate professionally in any business setting.
whyTakalam.audience6Desc: Planning to study, work, or travel abroad? English is your passport. We'll help you use it with confidence.

whatYouGet.title: What You
whatYouGet.subtitle: Clear value, no fluff. Here's exactly what's included in every lesson.
whatYouGet.feature1Desc: Personal attention focused entirely on you and your goals.
whatYouGet.feature2Desc: Every lesson is tailored to your level, interests, and needs.
whatYouGet.feature3Desc: You'll speak more than you listen. That's how you learn.
whatYouGet.feature4Desc: Clear, practical grammar—no complex rules you'll never use.
whatYouGet.feature5Desc: Words and phrases you'll actually use in real conversations.
whatYouGet.feature6Desc: Book lessons when it works for you. Your time, your pace.
whatYouGet.feature7Desc: Learn from anywhere with just your phone or laptop.
whatYouGet.feature8Desc: See how far you've come with regular check-ins and feedback.

pricing.title: Simple, Transparent
pricing.subtitle: Choose the package that fits your learning goals. No hidden fees.
pricing.note4: Prices may vary for special goals (exams, interviews)

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Simple. No complexity. No dashboards. Just learning.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Pick the package that fits your goals. Start with a single session (200 DHS) to try it out, or commit to a package for better value.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Complete your bank transfer and submit the registration form with your payment proof. We'll verify within 24 hours.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Get WhatsApp access, schedule your sessions, and begin your English journey. Your first session includes a level check to personalize everything.

testimonials.title: Real Students,
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from people who started just like you — and are now speaking with confidence.
testimonials.quote1: I used to understand everything but freeze when speaking. After two months with Takalam, I led my first meeting in English. The confidence I gained is incredible.
testimonials.quote2: The lessons feel like conversations with a friend, not a teacher. I actually look forward to them. My interview went great thanks to the practice we did together.
testimonials.quote3: Finally, someone who understands that I need to speak, not just study grammar. My English has improved more in 3 months than in years of traditional classes.
testimonials.trustBadge: Join students from Casablanca, Rabat, Marrakech, and beyond

finalCta.headline: Ready to Speak English
finalCta.subtext: You already know me from social media. Now let's work together. Choose your package, pay, and start your English journey.
finalCta.trustText: Try with a single session (200 DHS) • Secure bank transfer • WhatsApp access after payment

contact.title: Register &
contact.subtitle: Complete your registration by making a payment and uploading your proof. We'll contact you within 24 hours to schedule your first lesson.
contact.tryFirst: Not sure yet? Try a single session first.
contact.tryFirstDesc: Book one session for 200 DHS to experience the Takalam method before committing to a package.
contact.step1Desc: Select your package and make a bank transfer
contact.step2Desc: Fill out the form below with your payment proof
contact.step3Desc: Get WhatsApp access within 24 hours & schedule your first session
contact.transferNote: Include your full name in the transfer reference
contact.importantText: WhatsApp access is provided only after payment verification. Please upload a clear screenshot of your bank transfer.
contact.successText: We'll verify your payment and contact you within 24 hours with WhatsApp access.
contact.errorText: Please email us directly at takalamenglishcenter@gmail.com
contact.selectPackage: Select the package you paid for...
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your goals, preferred schedule, or any questions...
contact.whatsappNote: WhatsApp access is provided after payment verification.

footer.description: Personal English tutoring for adults. Moroccan roots, global mindset.
